Module com.example.project_4
Package com.example.project_4

Class CustomController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project_4.CustomController
public class CustomController
extends java.lang.Object
The JavaFx controller of customView GUI. Manages the customization of a pizza.
Author:
Kevin Cubillos, Ethan Chang

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Sets up the initial screen.

    • setUpScreen

      protected void setUpScreen​(MenuController controller, java.lang.String flavor, javafx.scene.image.Image img)
      Updates screen to the specific pizza. Image and toppings are updated to corresponding pizza.
      Parameters:
      controller - MenuController reference
      flavor - the type of pizza flavor
      img - the image of pizza flavor

    • addTopping

      private void addTopping()
      Adds a topping to the pizza and updates price and GUI. Shows error if max toppings amount has been reached.

    • removeTopping

      private void removeTopping()
      Removes a topping from the pizza and updates GUI. Error is shown when a required topping is attempted to be removed.

    • updateSize

      private void updateSize()
      Updates the size of the pizza and updates GUI.

    • addToOrder

      private void addToOrder()
      Adds the pizza to the current order and closes the window.
